Cancellation and Refund Policy

Last updated: Aug 10, 2022

Thanks for purchasing our products (or subscribing to our services) at Axion Stack operated by Awin Abi.

We offer a full money-back guarantee for all purchases made on our website. If you are not satisfied with the product that you have purchased from us, you can get your money back no questions asked. You are eligible for a full reimbursement within 7 calendar days of your purchase.

After the 7-day period you will no longer be eligible and won't be able to receive a refund. We encourage our customers to try the product (or service) in the first two weeks after their purchase to ensure it fits your needs.

If you have any additional questions or would like to request a refund, feel free to contact us.

Point of Contact

For any questions and clarifications reach us on these channels.
